Funny how butthurt everyone gets about the file type..   .mkv's are playable by WMP, VLC, AND obviously DIVX plus media player.

All you need is the correct codec from one of these softwares, and after that either of the programs will play it without issue.

Your computer might be garb, so don't blame the uploader.

Also mkv format is great because it can contain hi-quality audio and video and can be compressed into small size, you are just butthurt because your PC is fucked.

I love MKV these days. My BluRay player can play it, so I can put great looking video without much space. Of course VLC works fine as well. If you don't use it, that's fine. But it's kind of stupid to claim that it's "useless" just because you don't like it for some reason.
